----

~This module provides functions to deal with logging~.
    ~It extends <<a_api | module Lwt_log_core >> with ~Unix features~.
    ~It adds~:


* logging to the syslog daemon
* logging to a channel ~(stderr~, stdout~, ~.~.~.~)
* logging to a file
